formattedAddress: 123 W 79th St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 123 W 79th St, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: Neway Fertility is top notch, if you are searching for a clinic for you, Neway is the one. You are in the best hands with Dr.Kort and Dr. Wang. They will guide you in the best direction according to your specific case. They fully listen to your personal needs and concerns and do whatever it takes to make you feel comfortable. The Nursing staff is phenomenal , Lindsay Blackburn will address any concerns/needs that may surface. She  responds to every inquiry you may have, via email/phone. She never misses a beat! Erica Pagan is also terrific at financially coordinating your needs. As a whole, I have had a wonderful experience with Neway Fertility and if you are looking for personal, dedicated care during this process, Neway Fertility is for you, you will not be disappointed! Also, when you walk into your appointment you feel like you are getting a VIP service, they never over book and I have never waited for anything, I truly feel like they open the office for me and me only, great experience hands down -- love this place and the whole entire staff.

originalText.text: I can't recommend Dr. Wang highly enough. He is incredible. Exceptional bedside manner. Really gets to know his patients. Performs all ultrasounds himself and follows up personally with results. Thanks to Dr. Wang and his staff, including embryologist Dr. Lee, I was successful in becoming pregnant twice at 39 and 41, and I am a mother now.

Performs all ultrasounds himself and follows up personally with results. Thanks to Dr. Wang and his staff, including embryologist Dr. Lee, I was successful in becoming pregnant twice at 39 and 41, and I am a mother now.

originalText.text: Neway is the best! Dr Kort is amazing, encouraging and far more hands on than any other place I’ve heard about. I saw him each visit, even if it was for 5min. My only struggle was logistical. They opened at 7:30 and it made it tough to get to work on time. Other than that I would recommend working with him and the whole staff there to anyone. My baby is 4 months today and I still look at the embryo (they gave me a picture) the day she was transferred!

text.text: Neway is the best! Dr Kort is amazing, encouraging and far more hands on than any other place I’ve heard about. I saw him each visit, even if it was for 5min. My baby is 4 months today and I still look at the embryo (they gave me a picture) the day she was transferred!

originalText.text:
I cannot recommend Dr. Kort and the entire staff of Neway enough. After a frankly atrocious experience at RMA Brooklyn, who dropped the ball every step of the way, I was upset and exasperated with all things IVF, (which according to more than one doctor, was our only means of getting pregnant). A friend of mine who was a patient of Dr. Kort’s the year prior strongly encouraged us to have a consult with him, and I’m so glad she did.

While RMA Brooklyn was super convenient being only an 8-minute walk from our apartment, and Neway 45 minutes on the subway, after my husband and I went for just a consult, we knew immediately that the commute was worth it for the drastically improved experience. Dr. Kort is kind, caring, a good listener; he’d read my file, asked questions, and allowed us all the time in the world to ask our own. Having the same doctor throughout my entire treatment made me feel like I really had someone who knew my case, knew me, was invested in the outcome, and brought a superb level of care and humanity to the entire experience.

Emails and phone calls were returned promptly; there was just so much kindness to the care—honestly, unlike any other doctor, IVF, or otherwise, I’ve experienced in my 15 years of living in NY. From the very first appointment, Dr. Kort demonstrated a level of compassion and dedication that truly made me feel seen and valued, not just as a patient, but as an individual. The environment always felt supportive and caring; the small size of the team made seeing familiar faces for every visit so much more enjoyable.

I was floored by how quickly my queries were responded to (trying to get a hold of a nurse or doctor at RMA was like pulling teeth). I was never made to feel rushed or like any of my questions or concerns were silly or overly anxious. All the staff were just so warm and lovely. I felt safe while on such an anxiety-inducing journey.

If, like me, you don’t live near Neway, I can tell you it is wholeheartedly worth the extra transit time.

originalText.text: We can’t thank Dr. Wang enough for the wonderful care and support he provided during our infertility ivf journey. Infertility just plain sucks, and having a doctor who is caring, patient, determined and really wants the best for you is so important. We received all of this and more from him and all the staff. Dr. Wang was willing to personalize my treatment and was there for us every step of the way. His bedside manner is next level and you will never find another doctor like him. We travelled from BC to Newyork twice for ivf to work with him because we trust him so much. We will never forget the comfort he provided us. Highly recommend. Thank you so much to everyone at Neway & AFS.
